name: Like Jimmy
content: I smoke a joint and wrapped a band
Around my motherf**king head like jimmy
Purple haze I'm on purple haze
To come down I need a couple days
I smoke a joint and wrapped a band
Around my motherf**king head like jimmy
F**k you with my vest and my boots on
Flip my tongue now she open
If she bad I want it
Ass fat got my name tatted on it
I smoke a joint and wrapped a band
Around my motherf**king head like jimmy
